item.title: ADF 1
item.description: 1. What are the different types of Integration runtimes(IR) in ADF, and when should you use each? Integration runtime (IR) is a compute engine that provides computational resources to perform data movement, transformation, and orchestration in ADF. Types of Integration Runtimes Azure IR Use when performing data movement, transformation, and orchestration entirely within the cloud. Self-Hosted IR Use when any source or destination is an on-premises system. Required to pull data from on-prem systems. Azure SSIS IR
